metadata.dc:author: Noé-Sebastián, E
Martínez-Vila, E
Luquin, M R
metadata.dc:description: Visuospatial impairment has been frequently reported in Parkinson's disease (PD). We present the progressive distortion performance of the Rey-Osterrieth complex figure in parkinsonian patients at different stages of the disease (PD de novo, PD on long-term treatment, PD with phychosis and PD with dementia).
metadata.dc:title: La visión parkinsoniana de la figura compleja de Rey-Osterrieth.
[The parkinsonian view of the Rey-Osterrieth complex figure].
